Body:
"""
    Test that population growth rates evolve smoothly.
    """
E = 20
S = 80
T = int(round(4.0 * S))
start_year = 2018
(omega, g_n_ss, omega_SS, surv_rate, rho, g_n_vector, imm_rates, omega_S_preTP
    ) = demographics.get_pop_objs(E, S, T, 1, 100, start_year, False)
assert np.any(np.absolute(imm_rates[:-1, :] - imm_rates[1:, :]) < 0.0001)
